text:
ja#nayatiq sOmEq sOma#maqBi gRu#hNAtiq rEta# Eqva tad-da#dhAti suqSarmA#&si supratiShThAqna ityA#haq sOmEq hi sOma#maBigRuqhNAtiq prati#ShThityA Eqtasmiqn vA apiq grahE# manuqShyE$ByO dEqvEBya#H piqtRuBya#H kriyatE suqSarmA#&si supratiShThAqna ityA#ha manuqShyE$Bya EqvaitEna# karOti bRuqhadityA#ha dEqvEBya# EqvaitEna# karOtiq 
namaq ityA#ha piqtRuBya# EqvaitEna# karOtyEq ( ) tAva#tIq rvai dEqvatAqstABya# Eqvainaq(gm)q sarvA$ByO gRuhNAtyEqSha tEq yOniqrviSvE$ByastvA dEqvEByaq ityA#ha vaiSvadEqvO hyE#ShaH || 25 
(viSvEq - pra - piqtRuBya# EqvaitEna# karOqtyE - kAqnnavi(gm)#SaqtiSca#) (A7)
